values: haHA i havent been on this shit in like a year .. what worthless shit this is !!

<FONT color=#3333ff>so i havent updated in like a year and o well how reads this shit neways ... welll last nite was fun. we started off at priscillas and playing kings(the card game) and then suits its was sooo much fun. we played with john barbero and brian and i seriously  have never laughed as much as  i did when john was playing with us holy shit me and maggie and ashley were laughing so much  but then everyone had to leave because her mom was coming home and SOMEONE was being so mean to her and i dont know why she puts herself through .. cill- hes not worth it, you so much better then him....then me maggie mike cliff saxton and eslie went back to mikes and it was super. we played a lot of games of beer pong an got drunk it was good times ... me and maggie have some awesome memories at mikes lol ... i love that bitch. well we are going to eat breakfast soon ....</FONT>

well im in penn. and im with michelle and we are at nikkis my cousins and she is about to come and pick us up and then we are going to work with her which is at a daycare with little little kids im excited. ive been there before so maybe the kids will recognize me ... idk ? well i was suppose to come home wednesday orignally but then my grandfather is going home today so im not going home and then my sister is coming up today also with kyle and then going home tuesday and soooo me and michelle are going to sleep at my aunts tonight and tomarrow night and then take the train home wednesday just me and michelle so we are excited to do that. well im going to get dressed to go to work ughh but exciting. bye.

well me and paul  broke up ... we broke up a while ago but i havent updated so i tell the story... we were at kylies fire and paul got drunk and started being a real big asshole to me and whenever he gets drunk hes such an asshole ... only to me though (its weird) welll so i got so sick of it i broke up with him so me and ryan started "talking" and he called me one day and asked me to come over so i did and then we made hot love (just kidding haha) and then he asked me out so i said yes and that was on the 15th of december . LONG TIME SO FAR! lol .. i dont really hang out with anyone except michelle and maggie because everyone went gay on me. The only time i see those people is at kylies on weekends but im too drunk to remember and i dont even talk to them at all. me and maggie talk the whole night and make subway and taco bell and wendy runs lol. well so now me and ryan go out its basically ryan michelle and maggie. because im too cool for everyone.

well things at home calm down . my mom and me arent fightin right now but i know there will be an argument tonite i can feel it and i need new sneakers and pants and i know im not gonna get them until like next week and i want them for school. so ali snuck over today and right when she left my dad came home it was a close one but my dad was just like what is ali doing here and i said she had to get her clothes for school tomarrow lol something gay like that. well it worked and i have a feeling my parents are going to drug test me and i think i should pass... yea i should but still thats gay because then they cant trust me o well as long as i pass i can just rub it in their faces.well lately it doesnt seem like ppl care about me except ky ali shay and megan. they are the only ones that took time out to help me through this. i fucking love this world.

im so depressed i cant take living in this house ... ill explain .

last wednesday i went to six flags with shana and priscilla. i got caught stealing two belly button rings. They took me to an office and told shay and cill to get my mother and so they did and she came and we had to fill out paper work  and shit and then they sed i am banned from six flags for a year and if caught on six flags property i get arrested. im getting a fine in 2-6 weeks from 0-500$ if nothing comes then no fine .. everyone has told me that there will be no fine because its something so little. well anyways now im grounded for a month "suppously" well for the past 3 days i have been on my boat with michelle (so much for being grounded right?) well then i went over alis today (my dad sed i could) so i came home from practice and ate dinner and then i was gonna go to alis but then my mom was like no ur grounded . like i dont understand anymore im only grounded when they please. and it bugs the shit out of me and i want to run away sooo badly and my mom said the doors are open to leave but not to come back. so i dont know what to do. kylie says it will blow over but ali says to come and live with her and im so twisted i just dont know what the hell to do. im so confused. its my last nite of my summer and im sitting at home like theyre is something wrong with this .. help me should i run away or let it blow over ? ?? COMMENT!

p.s. my mom said she gonna start to take me to conselling.. wow how fucked up is that?  ??
